titles.title: He's Changing And He's Changing And He's Changing Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He's changing and He's changing
And He's changing me.
He's changing and He's changing
And He's changing me.
He never changes so I must change, you see.
He's the same yesterday, today, and forever.
His love is true and He changes never.
Into God's very own image, He's changing me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He's loving and loving and loving me,
Loving and loving and loving me.
God is love and He's giving His love to me.
Love is long-suffering, patient and kind;
Love comes when we're one in Christ's mind.
Into His very own image He's changing me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He's purging and purging and purging me.
Purging and purging and purging me.
He's holy and pure so a purging's got to be in me.
It's the purifying fire of God's holy love;
It's the greatest power in earth or above.
Into His very own image He's changing me.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Me cambia, me cambia, me cambia a mi (2x)
El nunca cambia pero si me cambia a mi.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
